subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: While Cuddyer was out with a knee injury, the Mets acquired three veterans, and a top prospect earned their trust. So Cuddyer, even while earning $8.5 million this year, could become a bench player.
snippet: While Cuddyer was out with a knee injury, the Mets acquired three veterans, and a top prospect earned their trust. So Cuddyer, even while earning $8.5 million this year, could become a bench player.
